caution_message: This product contains wheat, soy, and processed ingredients that may not align with a strict vegan diet. It is also high in sodium, which may be a concern for hypertension. Always read labels and choose products with minimal processing and additives when possible.
short_term_effects: Increased sodium intake may lead to water retention and elevated blood pressure.
The high refined carbohydrate content could cause blood sugar spikes.
Flavor enhancers might contribute to cravings for savory foods.
long_term_effects: Regular consumption of highly processed foods with refined carbohydrates and unhealthy fats may contribute to weight gain and increase the risk of chronic diseases like diabetes and heart disease.
High sodium intake over time can exacerbate hypertension and potentially lead to kidney problems.
Reliance on artificial flavors may impact taste preferences and make it harder to enjoy whole
